name: Stranger Creeps
description:
A short horror game based on stalking and insecurity

Stylized to look like a PS1 game

Average playtime lasts about 15+ minutes

Best played in a dark room with headphones

---------------------------------------

I need to throw out the trash...

---------------------------------------

[CONTROLS]

WASD - Movement

Left mouse button - Interact

Right mouse button - Zoom

Left shift - Sprint

Space - Dialogue

(Consider leaving a comment and a rating, it helps me a lot!)
